member.summary: Executes an insert query for the specified entity.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.DapperExt.Insert``1(System.Data.IDbConnection,``0,System.Data.IDbTransaction,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Executes an insert query for the specified entity, returning the primary key. If the entity has a single key, just the value is returned. If the entity has a composite key, an IDictionary<string, object> is returned with the key values. The key value for the entity will also be updated if the KeyType is a Guid or Identity.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.DapperExt.GetMap``1
member.summary: Gets the appropriate mapper for the specified type T. If the mapper for the type is not yet created, a new mapper is generated from the mapper type specifed by DefaultMapper.

member.summary: Clears the ClassMappers for each type.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.DapperExt.GetNextGuid
member.summary: Generates a COMB Guid which solves the fragmented index issue. See: http://davybrion.com/blog/2009/05/using-the-guidcomb-identifier-strategy

member.summary: Automatically maps an entity to a table using a combination of reflection and naming conventions for keys.

member.summary: Maps an entity to a table through a collection of property maps.

member.summary: Fluently, maps an entity property to a column

member.summary: Fluently, maps an entity property to a column

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.ClassMapper`1.SchemaName
member.summary: Gets or sets the schema to use when referring to the corresponding table name in the database.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.ClassMapper`1.TableName
member.summary: Gets or sets the table to use in the database.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.ClassMapper`1.Properties
member.summary: A collection of properties that will map to columns in the database table.

member.name: T:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PluralizedAutoClassMapper`1
member.summary: Automatically maps an entity to a table using a combination of reflection and naming conventions for keys. Identical to AutoClassMapper, but attempts to pluralize table names automatically. Example: Person entity maps to People table

member.name: T:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.IPropertyMap
member.summary: Maps an entity property to its corresponding column in the database.

member.name: T:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap
member.summary: Maps an entity property to its corresponding column in the database.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.Column(System.String)
member.summary: Fluently sets the column name for the property.
member.param: The column name as it exists in the database.

member.summary: Fluently sets the key type of the property.
member.param: The column name as it exists in the database.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.Ignore
member.summary: Fluently sets the ignore status of the property.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.ReadOnly
member.summary: Fluently sets the read-only status of the property.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the property by using the specified propertyInfo.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.ColumnName
member.summary: Gets the column name for the current property.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.KeyType
member.summary: Gets the key type for the current property.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.Ignored
member.summary: Gets the ignore status of the current property. If ignored, the current property will not be included in queries.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets the read-only status of the current property. If read-only, the current property will not be included in INSERT and UPDATE queries.

member.name: P:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.PropertyMap.PropertyInfo
member.summary: Gets the property info for the current property.

member.name: T:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.KeyType
member.summary: Used by ClassMapper to determine which entity property represents the key.

member.name: F:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.KeyType.NotAKey
member.summary: The property is not a key and is not automatically managed.

member.name: F:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.KeyType.Identity
member.summary: The property is an integery-based identity generated from the database.

member.name: F:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.KeyType.Guid
member.summary: The property is a Guid identity which is automatically managed.

member.name: F:MDORM.DapperExt.Mapper.KeyType.Assigned
member.summary: The property is a key that is not automatically managed.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.Predicates.Field``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}},MDORM.DapperExt.Operator,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Factory method that creates a new IFieldPredicate predicate: [FieldName] [Operator] [Value]. Example: WHERE FirstName = 'Foo'
member.param: An expression that returns the left operand [FieldName].
Effectively inverts the comparison operator. Example: WHERE FirstName <> 'Foo'.

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.Predicates.Property``2(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0,System.Object}},MDORM.DapperExt.Operator,System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``1,System.Object}},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Factory method that creates a new IPropertyPredicate predicate: [FieldName1] [Operator] [FieldName2] Example: WHERE FirstName = LastName
member.typeparam: The type of the entity for the left operand.
The type of the entity for the right operand.
member.param: An expression that returns the left operand [FieldName1].
An expression that returns the right operand [FieldName2].
Effectively inverts the comparison operator. Example: WHERE FirstName <> LastName

member.name: M:MDORM.DapperExt.Predicates.Group(MDORM.DapperExt.GroupOperator,MDORM.DapperExt.IPredicate[])
member.summary: Factory method that creates a new IPredicateGroup predicate. Predicate groups can be joined together with other predicate groups.
member.param: The grouping operator to use when joining the predicates (AND / OR).
A list of predicates to group.
